body_html: Ok this is basically issue #14184 i.e. nn.NLLLoss(weight=weight, reduction='elementwise_mean') ignores weights but nn.NLLLoss(weight=weight, reduction='sum') does not ignore weights. I'm not sure if this is a bug or a documentation issue, but I would expect (and want!) "elementwise_mean" to do a weighted mean.
